00013 const ConstMap<std::string,int> Initialization = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00014     ("Random",KMEANS_RANDOM_CENTERS)
00015     ("PP",KMEANS_PP_CENTERS);
00016 
00024 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00025                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00026 {
00027     // Check the number of arguments
00028     if (nrhs<2 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>3)
00029         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00030     
00031     // Argument vector
00032     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00033     Mat samples(rhs[0].toMat(CV_32F));
00034     int clusterCount = rhs[1].toInt();
00035     Mat labels;
00036     TermCriteria criteria;
00037     int attempts=10;
00038     int flags = KMEANS_RANDOM_CENTERS;
00039     Mat centers;
00040     for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00041         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00042         if (key=="InitialLabels")
00043             labels = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00044         else if (key=="Criteria")
00045             criteria = rhs[i+1].toTermCriteria();
00046         else if (key=="Attempts")
00047             attempts = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00048         else if (key=="Initialization")
00049             flags = Initialization[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00050         else
00051             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00052     }
00053     flags |= (labels.empty()) ? 0 : KMEANS_USE_INITIAL_LABELS;
00054     
00055     // Process
00056     double d = kmeans(samples, clusterCount, labels, criteria, attempts, flags,
00057         centers);
00058     plhs[0] = MxArray(labels);
00059     if (nlhs>1)
00060         plhs[1] = MxArray(centers);
00061     if (nlhs>2)
00062         plhs[2] = MxArray(d);
00063 }
